// getting-started.asciidoc:512

[source, php]
----
$params = [
    'index' => 'bank',
    'body' => [
        'query' => [
            'bool' => [
                'must' => [
                    [
                        'match' => [
                            'age' => '40',
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
                'must_not' => [
                    [
                        'match' => [
                            'state' => 'ID',
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ],
];
$response = $client->search($params);
----
